mapper.insert: insert into landing.if_in_rental_car_rq_rs( created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , name , rental_status , confirmedmodelofrentalcar , confirmedrentalstartdate , confirmedrentalenddate )values( now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' , #{name} , #{rentalStatus} , #{confirmedModelofRentalCar} , to_date(#{confirmedRentalStartDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') , to_date(#{confirmedRentalEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
